factions.name: Shiawase Executive Taskforce
factions.notes: Tier-one rapid response team deployed to clean up magical anomalies and corporate espionage.

factions.name: Ancients Seattle Chapter
factions.notes: Notorious go-gang specializing in high-speed smuggling runs between Tir Tairngire and the Seattle sprawl.

factions.name: Cascade Ork Underground Cell
factions.notes: Grassroots network advocating for Ork rights while quietly financing shadow ops to destabilize Humanis chapters.

factions.name: NeoNET Draco Foundation Liaison
factions.notes: A small think tank managing the late Dunkelzahn’s Seattle interests and tracking dangerous artifacts.

factions.name: Yakuza Ryumyo-kai
factions.notes: Traditionalist syndicate faction that enforces strict codes while expanding into Matrix gambling dens.

factions.name: Renraku Red Samurai Liaison
factions.notes: Elite strike team coordinating corporate extractions and arcology lockdown protocols with surgical precision.

factions.name: Aztechnology Nightwatch Council
factions.notes: Shadow board that supervises sacrificial research assets and silences whistleblowers before dawn hits the Yucatán.

factions.name: Mitsuhama Zero Division
factions.notes: Matrix hunters who specialize in burning shadow hosts, backtracing deckers, and turning them into compliant assets.

factions.name: Horizon NewsNet SpinTeam
factions.notes: Influence brokers crafting positive narratives for Horizon clients while crowd-sourcing dirt on rivals.

factions.name: Evo Nova Medical Outreach
factions.notes: Corporate charity arm that swaps advanced bio-ware for loyalty contracts and discreet field trials.

locations.name: Downtown Seattle Safehouse
locations.descriptor: Luxury high-rise condominium fitted with rating 4 security, drone overwatch, and a concealed panic room.

locations.name: Redmond Barrens Refuge
locations.descriptor: Repurposed textile mill turned shadow community clinic; guarded by the local ork underground.

locations.name: The Matchstick Jazz Club
locations.descriptor: Beloved speakeasy frequented by runners, with hidden bolt-holes and a backroom talismonger.

locations.name: Tacoma Docks Warehouse 12
locations.descriptor: Shipping warehouse on the docks with easy smuggling access, drone loading gantries, and a sub-basement lab.

locations.name: Urban Brawl Training Grounds
locations.descriptor: Abandoned stadium in Auburn converted into an urban combat simulation arena with AR overlay grids.

locations.name: Renraku Arcology Quarantine Shell
locations.descriptor: Downtown mega-structure with sealed sectors, automated turrets, and eerie post-crash silence.

locations.name: Puyallup Warrens Encampment
locations.descriptor: Maze of geothermal vents, squatter markets, and gang checkpoints mapped only by local fixers.

locations.name: Everett Naval Retrofit Yard
locations.descriptor: Heavily patrolled drydock where experimental submersibles trade hands under UCAS oversight.

locations.name: Council Island Diplomatic Compound
locations.descriptor: Salish-Shidhe enclave offering neutral ground, awakened security, and mundane visitors on strict timers.

locations.name: Sea-Tac Mage Transit Hub
locations.descriptor: Ward-layered annex supporting astral travel logistics, licensed summoners, and priority corporate traffic.

session_seeds.title: Night Market Recon
session_seeds.objectives: Scout the Redmond night market, identify the smuggler kingpin, plant a tracer
session_seeds.summary: Crowded bazaar of illicit gear, competing fixer factions, undercover Lone Star stings.

session_seeds.title: Arcology Breach
session_seeds.objectives: Bypass Renraku lockdown, extract R&D asset, evade Red Samurai pursuit
session_seeds.summary: Layered security nodes, drone patrols, desperate corporate scientist ready to bail.

session_seeds.title: Spirit Hunt in the Warrens
session_seeds.objectives: Track rogue toxic spirit, secure ritual site, appease local fixer
session_seeds.summary: Polluted alleyways, desperate squatters, awakened fallout from illegal dumping.

session_seeds.title: Matrix Double Cross
session_seeds.objectives: Jack into Mitsuhama host, swap paydata, frame rival team
session_seeds.summary: Sculpted ice palaces, roaming IC avatars, corp deckers sniffing for intruders.
